workflow.title: Purely digital process
workflow.subtitle: From scan to product. Controlled precision at every stage.

retainers.title: Retainer Splints
retainers.description: Digitally designed retainer splints providing full control over insertion path and seating stability. Based on 3D scans, they enable precise management of geometry, thickness, and retention zones – unavailable in traditional thermoforming methods.
features: Significantly higher durability than thermoformed splints

guards.title: Occlusal Guards
guards.description: Night guards designed for bruxism protection. Variable thickness design – 2mm in occlusal zones, 1mm in non-load-bearing areas. Significantly higher material and structural durability compared to traditional thermoforming methods.
features: Significantly higher durability than traditional methods

aligners.title: Whitening Aligners
aligners.description: Individually designed whitening aligners based on 3D scans. Precision fit to patient anatomy with controlled thickness for comfort and predictable whitening results.

injection.title: Injection stamp system
injection.description: Digital system for type I cavity reconstruction based on pre-preparation scan. 3D printed form enables flowable composite injection and 1:1 anatomy reconstruction as an alternative to ceramic inlays.

precision.title: 1:1 Replication
precision.desc: Precise anatomy reconstruction from pre-operative data

time.title: Minimal steps
time.desc: Simplified clinical protocol without laboratory stage

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: We use advanced 3D printing and digital design technologies to create precise dental solutions from scan data.

contact.title: Start collaboration
contact.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about our solutions.

company.title: About
company.description: Digital dental laboratory specializing in precision 3D printing.

footer.copyright: APM Digital Dental Lab. All rights reserved.

software.title: Next-generation CAD/CAM
software.subtitle: for digital dentistry
software.vision: We're building a new generation of CAD/CAM software, designed from the ground up for modern digital dentistry. Not as another interface layer — but as a new engine.

why.title: Why a new system?
why.description: Today's CAD/CAM solutions were created over a decade ago. They're stable, proven — but technologically based on architecture not designed for AI or GPU.
why.new: A system that understands tooth anatomy

anatomy.title: Digital anatomy
anatomy.desc: Analysis of shape, structure, and color directly from 3D scan data

recognition.title: Intelligent recognition
recognition.desc: Automatic detection, numbering, and classification of teeth

reconstruction.title: AI-driven reconstruction
reconstruction.desc: Geometry reconstruction preserving anatomy, occlusion, and proportions

gpu.title: GPU-accelerated
gpu.desc: Real-time design leveraging modern graphics card power

philosophy.title: Development philosophy
philosophy.description: We don't build 'everything at once'. We build exactly what has the greatest clinical and technological significance.

software.closing: We're not improving existing tools. We're designing what should exist if CAD/CAM were built from scratch today.
